publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-7735.3 Derek Brownlee: Protecting Public Servicesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S3M-7735) in the name of Patrick Harvie, leave out from "calls" to end and insert "believes that ensuring a strong economy is the best way to protect public services and create jobs and rejects calls to increase devolved taxes, for example by ending the council tax freeze or introducing a new non-domestic rate supplement for retailers."
